captions: The image shows a close-up of a WeatherWatch leak barrier installation on a red wall. The leak barrier is designed to prevent water damage and protect the wall from potential leaks. The barrier is made of a durable material that can withstand various weather conditions and is easy to install. The installation is a simple and effective solution for protecting the wall from water damage and ensuring the structural integrity of the building.

The barrier is placed on the roofs the building from water damage and ensuring the structural integrity of the building.

The man is wearing a red jacket, which makes him easily visible against the background.

There are two trucks in the scene, one on the left side and another on the right side of the image. The truck on the left is closer to the man, while the other truck is further away.
